text: Ferenc Puskás (2 April 1927 - 17 November 2006) was a Hungarian football striker, regarded as one of the greatest footballers of all time. He played for Hungary national team and Spain national team. He died of pneumonia at the age of 79. There is an award named after him. The award is called the FIFA Puskás Award. It is awarded to the player who scored the best goal in each year.
